column5: Thought I would share, for those that remember Ole Red.  https://youtu.be/NR01J4huJ_8  I have been trying to find the old shows,but no luck as of yet.
Ahh  the classic... The Night Before Fishing  Thanks
It was nice to just sit back and listen too. Yes the night before was fun to hear.
I have the book and pull it out once in a while and read one to the camp
I met Red Fisher himself and he signed his book of poems and the LP of him reading them,. This happened in 1975 and I still have both.
Brian , I just sent you a PM.  npt1
